entity.description: I am a developer and founder of Kowatek Solar LTD and Iwuchi Technologies LTD, building AI-integrated open-source solutions to optimize renewable energy systems in Africa. projects.name: EnergyAI
projects.description: EnergyAI is an AI-integrated open-source software platform designed to manage, monitor, and optimize IoT-connected renewable energy systems across diverse African climates. It supports solar and wind microgrids, remote sensors, smart batteries, and load controllers in areas with low connectivity and infrastructure challenges.
